mmorpg.chat.alt_to_show_other_spell: Press [Alt] to show the other Skill.
mmorpg.chat.too_low_level_to_upgrade_spe: Your level is too low to upgrade the Skill level.
mmorpg.chat.not_mns_weapon: You need a Mine and Slash Weapon (imbued with stats) to cast Skills.
mmorpg.chat.no_duplicate_aura: You can't equip duplicate Augment Gems.
mmorpg.chat.lack_aura_capacity: You lack the Augment capacity to equip all these Augments.
mmorpg.word.increasespelllevel: Unlock this Support Gem Slot by increasing your Skill Level!
mmorpg.word.jewel_desc: Items that boost a player's stats if socketed into the Jewel GUI.
mmorpg.word.support_gems_also_benefit: Support Gems from this Skill also benefit: %1$s
mmorpg.word.cast_fail_msgs:
Will print helpful messages when you fail to cast a skill.
Particularly Helpful for New Players!
Players below level 15 can't disable this option.
mmorpg.word.everyone_is_ally:
By default your skills only target your Mine and Slash team members and yourself.

With this enabled, your heals, buffs, etc., will target even un-teamed players!
mmorpg.chat.destroys_output: When Placed in a Profession Station with other inputs/materials, it will make all recipes produced give 2X the EXP but it will destroy the output.
library_of_exile.item_requirement.is_map: Must be a Dungeon Map Item
library_of_exile.item_requirement.map_ha: Map Rarity Must be Lower than Mythic
mmorpg.profession.desc.husbandry: Bounty Hunting enables you to take on tasks from the Bountiful Boards for rewards, including Cooking Profession Meats.
mmorpg.gui.master_backpack_loot_button: Transfer Eligible Items to Master Backpack
mmorpg.chat.must_be_in_map_to_accept_pro: You must be inside the same Map to accept Prophecy Rewards
mmorpg.chat.not_enough_favor_to_buy_prop: Not enough Prophecy Coins to claim the reward. Gain more Coin by killing Map mobs while afflicted with Prophecy Curses.
mmorpg.chat.prophecies_guide:
1) Kill mobs while cursed to gain Prophecy Coins.

2) Curses multiply the number of Coins you earn from kills. 

3) You can claim Prophecy rewards with your Coins below. 

4) Your Coins and Prophecy Curses reset upon entering another Map.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_altar_msg: The altar reacted to your touch! You can now open the Prophecies menu in the Hub and choose a Prophecy Curse to apply to yourself.
mmorpg.chat.prophecy_please_spend: You currently have a Prophecy Curse choice pending. Please select a Curse from the Prophecy menu first before using this altar.
mmorpg.word.prophecyplayeraffixinfo: Your rate of §eProphecy Coins§r gain will increase.
library_of_exile.relic_stat.bonus_skill_: %1$s Support and Augment Gem Drop Rate
library_of_exile.relic_stat.bonus_map_fr: %1$s Chance for Extra Boss Map Drop
the_harvest.words.relic_maps_only: This Harvest Only Accepts Relic Maps
the_harvest.words.map_item_use_info: Right Click the [Harvest Block] with the Map to start it!
the_harvest.words.new_map_given: The Harvest gifts you with a Map. You can use this Map to activate the Harvest.
the_harvest.words.harvest_end: The vines appear to shrink, for now...
mmorpg.item_tips.uber_boss_frag_tip: Combine fragments in the Crafting Table to create a Map That contains an Uber Portal.
mmorpg.item_tips.socket_extractor_usage: Click on gear to extract a Gem or Rune.
mmorpg.item_tips.rune_item_usage:
Socket into your gear in a specific combination to craft Runewords.
Right-click while holding to view available Runewords.
mmorpg.chat.awarded_talents: You have been awarded %1$s Talent Points.
mmorpg.item_tips.support_gem_explanation: Boost the power of the Skill it's socketed into.
mmorpg.tag.gear_slot.head: Hat
mmorpg.gearslot.head: Hat
mmorpg.gear_type.head: Hat
mmorpg.stat.fire_magic_shield_leech: §7Leech §a[VAL1]%§7 of your §c☀ Fire§7 Damage as Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat.chaos_magic_shield_leech: §7Leech §a[VAL1]%§7 of your §5☀ Chaos§7 Damage as Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat.lightning_magic_shield_leech: §7Leech §a[VAL1]%§7 of your §e☀ Lightning§7 Damage as Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat.physical_magic_shield_leech: §7Leech §a[VAL1]%§7 of your §6☀ Physical§7 Damage as Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat.water_magic_shield_leech: §7Leech §a[VAL1]%§7 of your §b☀ Cold§7 Damage as Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_elemental_damage: Increases all Elemental Damage dealt. Chaos and Physical are not Elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_sword_damage: Increases all Elemental Damage dealt if weapon type is held.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_bow_damage: Increases all Elemental Damage dealt if weapon type is held.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_crossbow_damage: Increases all Elemental Damage dealt if weapon type is held.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_staff_damage: Increases all Elemental Damage dealt if weapon type is held.
mmorpg.stat_desc.eff_dur_u_cast: Increases the duration of effects you cast, such as buffs and debuffs.
mmorpg.stat_desc.song_eff_dur_u_cast: Increases the duration of Song effects you cast, including buffs and debuffs.
mmorpg.stat_desc.totem_duration: Increases the duration of your Totem Skills.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_leech_cap: Determines how much resource you can leech from sources such as On Hit, On Kill, Leech per second. The cap is based on your max of that resource.
mmorpg.stat_desc.blood_leech_cap: Determines how much resource you can leech from sources such as On Hit, On Kill, Leech per second. The cap is based on your max of that resource.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_leech_cap: Determines how much resource you can leech from sources such as On Hit, On Kill, Leech per second. The cap is based on your max of that resource.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_leech_cap: Determines how much resource you can leech from sources such as On Hit, On Kill, Leech per second. The cap is based on your max of that resource.
mmorpg.stat_desc.energy_leech_cap: Determines how much resource you can leech from sources such as On Hit, On Kill, Leech per second. The cap is based on your max of that resource.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_chaos_damage_night: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks. Active only during the night.
mmorpg.stat_desc.physical_hits_dmg_reduc: Reduces all damage taken by a percentage. Only applies to hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_reduction: Reduces all damage taken by a percentage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_reduction_day: Reduces all damage taken by a percentage. Active only during the day.
mmorpg.stat.dmg_reduction_ll: Damage Reduction when on Low Health
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_reduction_ll: Reduces all damage taken by a percentage. Low Health is 50% or less.
mmorpg.stat.dmg_reduction_vll: Damage Reduction when on Very Low Health
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_reduction_vll: Reduces all damage taken by a percentage. Very Low Health is 25% or less.
mmorpg.stat_desc.cast_speed: Affects amount of time needed to cast Magic Skills. If the Skill is instant, it reduces the cooldown. Only works on spells tagged as Magic!
mmorpg.stat_desc.attack_cast_speed: Affects amount of time needed to cast Attack Skills. It also reduces the cooldown of Attack Skills. Only works on spells tagged as Attack!

mmorpg.stat_desc.bonus_phys_to_ele: Grants % of Physical Attack Damage as additional Elemental Damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity: Determines your total: Projectile Damage, Attack Speed, Critical Hit, Energy Regen, Dodge Rating
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Determines your total: Magic Damage, Increased Healing, Summon Damage, Mana Regen, Magic Shield
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength: Determines your total: Damage, Summon Health, Critical Damage, Health, Health Regen, Armor
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_basic_hit: The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_bolt_hit: The amount restored regenerates over a short period of time and is capped by your Leech Cap.
mmorpg.stat_desc.move_speed: Increases the rate at which you move.
mmorpg.stat_desc.attack_speed: Increases speed of basic attacks (melee and ranged) and cooldown of Attack-tagged Skills. Does NOT apply to Summons, since they don't use Attacks!
mmorpg.stat_desc.roll_cooldown: Reduces the time it takes for your roll to recharge.
mmorpg.stat_desc.draw_speed: Increase bow and crossbow draw speed.
mmorpg.stat_desc.block_reach: Increase range at which you can interact with blocks.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fishing_line_strength: Increases the strength of your fishing line, making it easier to fish.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fishing_bar_size: Increases the size of the fishing bar, making it easier to fish.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dodge: Chance to ignore attack damage. This is lowered by Accuracy.
mmorpg.stat_desc.accuracy: Increases your chance to hit an enemy, low Accuracy can also cause crits to fail. Against mobs, a comfortable amount of Accuracy is roughly 2-3x your level.
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor_penetration: Ignores a flat amount of the target's Armor. Against common mobs, full Armor Penetration is roughly 3x your level.
mmorpg.stat_desc.summon_undead_damage: Increases damage of your summoned undead minions.
mmorpg.stat_desc.summon_spider_damage: Increases damage of your summoned spider minions.
mmorpg.stat_desc.cursed_skill_damage: Increases damage of Cursed Skills (not including Curses).
mmorpg.stat_desc.random_spread_damage: Increases damage of Random Spread Skills.
mmorpg.stat.inc_effect_of_heal_over_time: [VAL1]% Heal Over Time Effect Strength on Self

mmorpg.stat.combat_talent_melee_hit: Gain §7§a25§7% More Ranged Skill Damage for 6s on Melee Skill Hit
mmorpg.stat.combat_talent_ranged_hit: Gain §7§a25§7% More Melee Skill Damage for 6s on Ranged Skill Hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.bleed_chance: Chance to cause Bleed on §6☀ Physical§7§9 Hits. Bleed deals 120% of the damage as §6☀ Physical§7§9 Damage over 5s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_chance: Chance to cause Burn on §c☀ Fire§7§9 Hits. Burn deals 100% of the damage as §c☀ Fire§7§9 Damage over 3s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.electrify_chance: Chance to cause Electrify on §e☀ Lightning§7§9 Hits. Accumulates 100% of the damage which can be activated with SHOCK to deal bonus §e☀ Lightning§7§9 Damage. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.freeze_chance: Chance to cause Freeze on §b☀ Cold§7§9 Hits. Slows target and accumulates 85% of the damage which can be activated with SHATTER to deal bonus §b☀ Cold§7§9 Damage. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_chance: Chance to cause Poison on §5☀ Chaos§7§9 Hits. Deals 150% of the damage as §5☀ Chaos§7§9 Damage over 10s. Damage is calculated on initial hit before damage mitigation and Critical Hits.
mmorpg.stat.exile_effect_to_source_benig: §7§a[VAL1]%§7 Chance to Gain§a Benign Mutation§7 on Hit
mmorpg.stat.exile_effect_to_source_pedip: §7§a[VAL1]%§7 Chance on Kill to produce§a Pedipalps§7 that §6☀ Grapple§7 Prey from a Distance
mmorpg.stat.chaos_dmg_when_low_hp: Chaos Damage when on Low Health
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG Skills deal. Skills include all actives on the Classes tree.
mmorpg.stat_desc.plus_spell_lvls_desc: Adds to Skill Level. Each Skill can only have +8 levels above their normal maximum!
mmorpg.stat_desc.gear_defense: Modifies the gear's local defense value, whether it's Armor, Magic Shield or Dodge Rating.
mmorpg.stat_desc.gear_weapon_damage: Modifies the gear's local base stats.
mmorpg.stat_desc.int_dmg: Magic Damage includes Skills with the Magic tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.int_dmg_received: Magic Damage includes Skills with the Magic tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.str_dmg: Melee Damage includes Skills with the Melee tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.str_dmg_received: Melee Damage includes Skills with the Melee tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dex_dmg: Ranged Damage includes Skills with the Ranged tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dex_dmg_received: Ranged Damage includes Skills with the Ranged tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.lightning_dmg_received: Increases damage taken from Lightning element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.fire_dmg_received: Increases damage taken from Fire element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.phys_dmg_received: Increases damage taken from Physical element.
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_attack_damage: Increases all Elemental attack damage, including Basic Attacks and Skills.
mmorpg.stat_desc.attack_damage: Increases all attack damage, including Basic Attacks and Skills.
mmorpg.stat.cast_speed_to_cooldown_cdr: Cast Speed to Cooldown Skill Cooldown Reduction
mmorpg.stat.cast_speed_to_cooldown_spell: Cast Speed to Cooldown Skill Damage
Cast Speed to Cooldown Damage Taken
mmorpg.stat.no_attacker_stats_on_selfdmg: Skills tagged as [Self Damage] do not trigger attacker's stat effects on the attacker.
mmorpg.stat_desc.inc_aoe: Skill Area of Effect will be larger.
mmorpg.stat.health_restore_effect_on_sel: Health Restoration Received when on Low Health
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_restore_effect_o: Increases all sources of restoration (regen, leech, skills, etc.) to your Health. Low Health is 50% or less.
mmorpg.stat.health_restore_effect_on_sel: Health Restoration Received when on Very Low Health
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_restore_effect_o: Increases all sources of restoration (regen, leech, skills, etc.) to your Health. Low Health is 25% or less.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_restore_ef: Increases all sources of restoration (regen, leech, skills, etc.) to your Magic Shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.area_cdr: Reduces Skill cooldown of Skills with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.arrow_cdr: Reduces Skill cooldown of Skills with the tag.
mmorpg.stat_desc.beast_cdr: Reduces Skill cooldown of Skills with the tag.

mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: An additional pool of vitality that gets depleted before Health.

mmorpg.stat_desc.lightning_ignore_ele_re: Ignored resists means Resistance stat won't proc. Also means penetration doesn't boost damage.
